1.definition: a proposition or situation offering a choice between two or more things only one of which may be chosen

2.definition: offering or expressing a choice [an contract] see alsoat

3.definition: existing or functioning outside the established systemdifferent from the usual or conventional [ sentencing]n

2 a.definition: one of two or more things, courses, or propositions to be chosen

sub_terms.b: something which can be chosen instead
